parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning brake wear indicator light can lead to premature brake failure, reduced stopping power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake wear indicator light does not illuminate or illuminate incorrectly
rotors need to be replaced frequently

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive brake fade can cause the vehicle to be difficult to stop, especially in stop-and-go traffic, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: difficult to drive in stop-and-go traffic
frequent brake pad and rotor replacements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improperly routed brake hoses can cause damage to the hoses, leading to brake fluid leaks, and potentially causing the brakes to fail.
symptoms: brake hoses need to be secured with tie-downs to prevent damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure and Loss of Vehicle Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.

The failure of the power operated visor can cause the blind to free spin and fall vertically down, blocking the driver's view of the highway, which can lead to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: causing the blind to free spin and fall vertically down
blocking the driver's view of the highway.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Control Arm Failure for Windshield Wipers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the control arm for the windshield wipers can cause the arm to break off at the steering column, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle due to reduced visibility.
symptoms: The control arm for the windshield wipers breaks off at the steering column
causing the windshield wipers to malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty electrical system can cause the engine to quit, leading to loss of braking power, which can result in accidents, especially on steep inclines or when carrying heavy loads. This can put the lives of passengers and other road users at risk.
symptoms: especially when driving uphill or carrying heavy loads
warning lights or alarms on the dashboard
burning smell or smoke from the electrical system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty trailer control module can cause a fire, which can spread quickly and result in a catastrophic loss of the vehicle and its cargo. This can also put the lives of passengers and other road users at risk.
symptoms: Smoke or flames from the trailer control module
warning lights or alarms on the dashboard
